body_html:
@carpodaster:

"Add a <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Atom Feed" ... > element to the header section on status_updates#show"

  1. I'm presuming you mean the "head" section and not the "header"?
  2. The head (and the header for that matter) are only specified generally for the whole app in layouts>applicatoin.html.slim. Do you want us to put it there?
body_text:
@carpodaster:

"Add a <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Atom Feed" ... > element to the header section on status_updates#show"


I'm presuming you mean the "head" section and not the "header"?
The head (and the header for that matter) are only specified generally for the whole app in layouts>applicatoin.html.slim. Do you want us to put it there?
body:
@carpodaster:

> "Add a <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Atom Feed" ... > element to the header section on status_updates#show"
1. I'm presuming you mean the "head" section and not the "header"?
2. The head (and the header for that matter) are only specified generally for the whole app in layouts>applicatoin.html.slim. Do you want us to put it there?
